KYSER.DEV

Building sites for the modern era.

Don't settle for gimmicks or marketing hype.

We aren't a "creative agency" that talks big and delivers barely passable work done by sub-contractors, we are a USA born and raised development task force.

We tell it straight, and call it how we see it.

Honest advice and transparency is how business should be done. We guide our clients to view the web as more than just an investment or a sales tool, but a reflection of their business akin to their office or retail space. Quality sells, and users are quick to judge and spread the word.

Consumer data privacy policy

Security Capabilities and Policy For Transmission of Payment Card Details

Customer Information Policy

When you place an order or pay an invoice

through kyser.dev, you will be required to

manually enter your credit card details. This information ­allows us to

process and fulfill your order successfully.

Customer Information Protection

When you place orders or pay an invoice, we use a secure ­server. The secure server software (SSL)­

encrypts all information you input before it is sent to us.

Furthermore, all of­ the sensitive customer data we collect ­is

protected by several layers of encryption and several layers of security

to ­prevent unauthorized access.

Credit Card Details

All credit card payments are processed ­securely through the Stripe Gateway.

SSL Certificate

We offer Credit Card payments

 Credit ­Card payments are made directly

through ­a 256-bit SSL Encryption software to ensure your personal

details are kept safe.
